void level_free ( level *  doomed  ) 

Frees a level.

Parameters:
doomed The level to free
This function does NOT free the input path.

chunk* level_get_chunk_at ( level *  lvl,
int  coord_x,
int  coord_z 
)

Loads a chunk from the map.

Parameters:
lvl The level whose chunks you wish to find
coord_x The x Coordinate of the chunk
coord_z The z Coordinate of the chunk
Returns:
The chunk corresponding to the coordinates, or NULL if it does not exist or on error.

void level_get_dimensions ( level *  lvl  ) 

Scans a world folder and derives its dimensions.

Parameters:
[in] lvl The level to read
Returns:
Fills parameters of the level passed.

level* level_load ( char *  path  ) 

Loads the given minecraft level.

Parameters:
path The path to the directory with the level data.
Returns:
A level containing the game map data, or NULL on error.
